name: McChuie & The End of the Internet
name_original: McChuie & The End of the Internet
description: The first episode in the McChuie Cinematic Universe (MCU) features the titular character rushing to save his beloved queen. There are more cars than Pixar's Cars 2. There's more danger than Anthony Weiner's tinder account. There are less gun battles than in the Matrix, but it's CLOSE.
